column3: ACK fa2333f.\n\nNit, should new tests be added at the end of the run-time section or should there be an effort to keep them sorted?

I would clarify it a little more, e.g.

```
# Don't add tests below this comment to avoid merge conflicts
# Put them in a location above this comment based on their approximate run-time
```

or maybe 'line' instead of 'comment'.

@promag Adding at the end of run-time sections doesn't help with merge conflict. Sorting by name would. Though, since we plan to rename the tests, I don't want to go in this direction.\n@thijstriemstra Reworked wording a bit.
